curPatternObj.1: Ready Posture: Warrior Ready Stance A
curPatternObj.2: Step 1. Slide to C to form a right L-stance toward D while executing a low guarding block to D with a reverse knife-hand. Perform in a circular motion.
curPatternObj.3: Step 2. Execute a high punch to D with the right long fist while forming a left walking stance toward D pivoting with the left foot. Perform in slow motion.
curPatternObj.4: Step 3. Slide to C forming a left L-stance toward D while executing a middle guarding block to D with the forearm.
curPatternObj.5: Step 4. Execute a middle outward strike to D with the right knife-hand while flying to D and then land to D forming a left L-stance toward D with the right knife-hand extended to D.
curPatternObj.6: Step 5. Shift to C maintaining a left L-stance toward D while executing a checking block to D with an X-fist.
curPatternObj.7: Step 6. Execute a high outward cross-cut to D with the right flat finger tip while forming a right walking stance toward D, slipping the right foot.
curPatternObj.8: Step 7. Execute a downward thrust with the right straight elbow while forming a left rear foot stance toward D, pulling the right foot.
curPatternObj.9: Step 8. Jump to D forming a left X-stance toward AD while executing a high side strike to D with the left back fist.
curPatternObj.10: Step 9. Move the right foot to C to form a left walking stance toward D while executing a low outward block to D with the right knife-hand.
curPatternObj.11: Step 10. Move the right foot on line AB to form a parallel stance toward D while executing a middle hooking block to D with the left palm.
curPatternObj.12: Step 11. Execute a middle punch to D with the right fist while maintaining a parallel stance toward D.
curPatternObj.13: Step 12. Slide to C forming a left L-stance toward D while executing a low guarding block to D with a reverse knife-hand. Perform in a circular motion.
curPatternObj.14: Step 13. Execute a high punch to D with the left long fist while forming a right walking stance toward D, pivoting with the right foot. Perform in slow motion.
curPatternObj.15: Step 14. Slide to C forming a right L-stance toward D while executing a middle guarding block to D with the forearm.
curPatternObj.16: Step 15. Execute a middle outward strike to D with the left knife-hand while flying to D and then land to D forming a right L-stance toward D with the left knife-hand extended to D.
curPatternObj.17: Step 16. Shift to C maintaining a right L-stance toward D while executing a checking block to D with an X-fist.
curPatternObj.18: Step 17. Execute a high outward cross-cut to D with the left flat finger tip while forming a left walking stance toward D, slipping the left foot.
curPatternObj.19: Step 18. Execute a downward thrust with the left straight elbow while forming a right rear foot stance toward D, pulling the left foot.
curPatternObj.20: Step 19. Jump to D forming a right X-stance toward BD while executing a high side strike to D with the right back fist.
curPatternObj.21: Step 20. Move the left foot to C to form a right walking stance toward D while executing a low outward block to D with the left knife-hand.
curPatternObj.22: Step 21. Move the left foot on line AB to form a parallel stance toward D while executing a middle hooking block to D with the right palm.
curPatternObj.23: Step 22. Execute a middle punch to D with the left fist while maintaining a parallel stance toward D.
curPatternObj.24: Step 23. Move the right foot to A to form a sitting stance toward D while executing a W-shape block with the reverse knife-hand.
curPatternObj.25: Step 24. Cross the left foot over the right foot to form a right X-stance toward D while executing a horizontal thrust with a twin elbow.
curPatternObj.26: Step 25. Move the right foot to A forming a sitting stance toward D while executing a checking block to D with a twin straight forearm.
curPatternObj.27: Step 26. Cross the left foot over the right foot to form a right X-stance toward D while executing an upward punch with the right fist, pulling the left side fist in front of the right shoulder.
curPatternObj.28: Step 27. Execute a high reverse hooking kick to B with the right foot.
curPatternObj.29: Step 28. Lower the right foot to B and then execute a high side piercing kick to B with the left foot pulling both hands in front of the chest while turning clockwise.
curPatternObj.30: Step 29. Lower the left foot to B in a jumping motion to form a left X-stance toward BD while executing a downward strike to B with the left backfist.
curPatternObj.31: Step 30. Move the left foot to B to form a sitting stance toward D while executing a W-shape block with the reverse knife-hand.
curPatternObj.32: Step 31. Cross the right foot over the left foot to form a left X-stance toward D while executing a horizontal thrust with a twin elbow.
curPatternObj.33: Step 32. Move the left foot to B forming a sitting stance toward D while executing a checking block to D with a twin straight forearm.
curPatternObj.34: Step 33. Cross the right foot over the left foot to form a left X-stance toward D while executing an upward punch with the left fist, pulling the right side fist in front of the left shoulder.
curPatternObj.35: Step 34. Execute a high reverse hooking kick to A with the left foot.
curPatternObj.36: Step 35. Lower the left foot to A and then execute a high side piercing kick to A with the right foot pulling both hands in front of the chest while turning counter clockwise.
curPatternObj.37: Step 36. Lower the right foot to A in a jumping motion to form a right X-stance toward AD while executing a downward strike to A with the right backfist.
curPatternObj.38: Step 37. Move the left foot to C forming a left L-stance toward D while executing a middle guarding block to D with the forearm.
curPatternObj.39: Step 38. Move the left foot to D turning counter clockwise to form a left rear foot stance toward C while executing a waist block to C with the right inner forearm.
curPatternObj.40: Step 39. Move the right foot to C slightly and then the left foot to D in a stamping motion to form a right L-stance toward D while executing a high outward strike to D with the left knife-hand.
curPatternObj.41: Step 40. Shift to C maintaining a right L-stance toward D while executing a middle guarding block to D with the forearm.
curPatternObj.42: Step 41. Move the right foot to D turning clockwise to form a right rear foot stance toward C while executing a waist block to C with the left inner forearm.
curPatternObj.43: Step 42. Move the left foot to C slightly and then the right foot to D in a stamping motion to form a left L-stance toward D while executing a high outward strike to D with the right knife-hand.
curPatternObj.44: Step 43. Move the right foot to C turning counter clockwise to form a right L-stance toward D while executing a middle guarding block to D with the forearm.
curPatternObj.45: Step 44. Jump to execute a mid-air kick to D with the right foot while spinning clockwise and then land to D to form a left L-stance toward D while executing a middle guarding block to D with a knife-hand.
curPatternObj.46: Step 45. Jump to execute a mid-air kick to D with the left foot while spinning counter clockwise and then land to D to form a right L-stance toward D while executing a middle guarding block to D with a knife-hand.
curPatternObj.47: Step 46. Execute a low inward block to D with the right reverse knife-hand pulling the left side fist in front of the right shoulder while forming a left walking stance toward D, slipping the right foot to C.
curPatternObj.48: Step 47. Slide to C to form a left L-stance toward D while thrusting to C with the left side elbow.
curPatternObj.49: Step 48. Execute a low inward block to D with the left reverse knife-hand pulling the right side fist in front of the left shoulder while forming a right walking stance toward D, slipping the left foot to C.
curPatternObj.50: Step 49. Slide to C forming a right L-stance toward D while thrusting to C with the right side elbow
curPatternObj.51: End: Bring the foot back to a ready position
curPatternObj.title: Yon-GaeEdit
